blank to the power of 4 log subscript 40 space end subscript minus space to the power of 4 log subscript 5
equals space to the power of 4 log subscript 40 minus 5 space end subscript
equals space to the power of 4 log subscript 35 space end subscript
equals space to the power of 4 log subscript 7.5 space end subscript
equals space to the power of 4 log subscript 7 space plus space end subscript to the power of 4 log subscript 5 space end subscript
